testcase.system-out: Given Open browser go to url "userUrl"......................................passed Then User clicks on the login link, enters "boramail" and "password" and logs in.passed Then User clicks on dashboard link..........................................passed Then User clicks My Coupons section on dashboard page.......................passed Then User confirms that the My Coupon page is accessible....................passed Then Closes the page........................................................passed
